original_title: Banda Calypso: Ao Vivo em Goiânia
overview: "Ao Vivo em Goiânia" is the fourth DVD of the Brazilian musical group Banda Calypso, recorded in Goiânia on October 5th and 6th, 2007, it brings a show full of new songs, with only 4 songs already known. It was released in November of the same year.  It brought a different show full of musical influences, and a participation of the duo of composers, Edu & Maraial (Edú Luppa and Marquinhos Maraial).
title: Banda Calypso: Ao Vivo em Goiânia
